title: WCAS HISTORY 334-0-1 The Age of the Reformation

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: A history of the Protestant and Catholic Reformations of the sixteenth century. Topics include theological controversies, religious radicalism, the role of women in the Reformation, formation of confessions, the witch craze, religious wars, religion and ritual, and the origins of religious toleration.
